title: Square Feet to Acres Converter – ft² to Acres, m² and Hectares

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Exact definitions 1 acre = 43,560 square feet 1 acre ≈ 4,046.8564224 m² ≈ 0.40468564224 hectares

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Formula acres = square feet ÷ 43,560 Example: 10,000 ft² ÷ 43,560 ≈ 0.2296 acres.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Formula square feet = acres × 43,560 Example: 0.75 acres × 43,560 = 32,670 ft².

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Formulas square metres = square feet × 0.09290304 hectares = square metres ÷ 10,000 Combining with the acre definition: square metres ≈ acres × 4,046.8564224 hectares ≈ acres ÷ 2.4710538147
